title: Driving the Future: SiC Market for Electric Vehicles Witnessing Exponential Growth with Superior Semiconductors and ... - GlobeNewswire
summary: The silicon carbide (SiC) market for electric vehicles (EVs) is projected to grow exponentially, reaching $9,031.2 million by 2032. The growth is driven by superior properties of SiC compared to traditional silicon, increasing demand for EVs, and investments in expanding SiC manufacturing capacity. Key players are forging partnerships and investing in developing improved SiC materials.

summary: Foxconn is ramping up hiring in China for a new series of iPhones. With tensions rising between the US and China and Huawei continuing to grow, Apple hopes to meet demand for its upcoming series of iPhones. The company is offering bonuses to new and returning employees at its Zhengzhou, China factory.
